products.title: Crushed Velvet Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Elegant pearl roman blinds, a median between their white and ivory, uses a light touch of cream to create a soft off-white tone. Product id: db-rom0867 fabric colour: pearl material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

A shade or two warmer than white, you can match this blind with just about any interior design scheme to add a drop of lavish luxury the crushed velvet pearl roman blind is soft, stylish and elegant.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Adopt an elegant and sophisticated look with the lustre in ivory through its bountiful fabric and tempting, lustrous shade. A foundation of refined, velvety material with a smoky grey hue produces elegant style with a regal and inviting feel. Astound your guests by incorporating fulsome texture and rich colour, through harmonising the soothing ivory with cream, silver, and caramel hues to create a neutral and sophisticated base, adding alike fabrics and quilted florals for just a dash of creative charm.
